General.Name: Forge Global Holdings Inc
General.Description: Forge Global Holdings, Inc. operates a financial services platform in California. The company's platform solutions include marketplace solutions, a private market platform which is designed to connect buyers looking to invest in private companies and sellers of company shares and related products; private company solutions, a private company to deliver comprehensive, tailored solutions for their liquidity and capital formation; asset management solutions for fund creation and management, redemption of fund units, and secured cash management; and data solutions for derived data and indices. It also provides custody solutions for self-directed IRA accounts and custody-as-a-service. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 4 Embarcadero Center, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94111
